vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
WBNB.decimals should be constant (WBNB.sol#8)
WBNB.name should be constant (WBNB.sol#6)
WBNB.symbol should be constant (WBNB.sol#7)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in WBNB.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.12 (WBNB.sol#3): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
